body:
Comment 13: 
gri,

I think gobuilder didn't fail on that test because it didn't run long enough:

https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/go/types/stdlib_test.go?repo=tools#112

Changing your 750 down to just 500 does not run this test here either. And my pc is
average fast. I would just let test run for longer. Maybe 10 seconds or even more.

Alex
